name: Sea To Summit Alpha 2 Pot Cookset 4.2
description: A lightweight backcountry cookset for the whole family. The aluminum pots disperse heat evenly so you won't burn your meals. The pivoting handle locks the lid in place for transport, and it all nests together so you barely notice it in your pack.Pots are lightweight hard-anodized aluminum that's durable and easy to clean.DeltaLight™ bowls and insulated mugs are glass-reinforced polypropylene that's microwave- and dishwasher-safe.Strainer lids and pivoting handles lock in place for solid handling.Graduations on pots and mugs for measuring.Textured base is secure on camp stoves.Everything nests together inside 3.7L pot during transportation.Includes 2.7L pot and 3.7L pot with strainer lids, four bowls, four insulated mugs, and dish cloth.
